summary: The son of a reputable physician struggles to live up to other people's expectations of him, until one day he is confronted by people who appear to die time and again.
cast: Borce Nacev|Vesna Stanojevska|Sabina Ajrula|Salaetin Bilal|Ratka Radmanovic|Filareta Atanasova|Dime Ilijev|Petar Mircevski|Vladimir Jacev|Goce Vlahov|Ana Kostovska|Zaklina Stefkovska|Izabela Novotni|Ilko Stefanovski|Vanja Radmilovic|Marina Pankova|Dragan Miladinovski|Joana Popovska|Kire Gorevski|Jordan Simonov|Branko Beninov|Boris Corevski|Sonja Osavkova|Laze Manaskov|Natasha Petrovic|Besford Idrizi|Martin Jordanoski|Dimitar Gjorgjievski|Nino Levi|Nesrin Tair|Amernis Noksiki|Bora Jovanovska|Ljupco Bresliski|Tamer Ibrahim|Baskim Ademi|Zora Georgieva|Jovan Korubin|Katarina Ilievska|Sofija Nasevska|Jana Vasileva|Vasil Siskov|Nadzi Shaban|Abdurahman Rahman|Mirsad Iseini|Zoran Ljutkov|Ratka Ilievska|Kire Georgiev|Natasa Naumovska|Vlado Dojcinovski|Edin Jakubovic|Petar Dimoski|Antonio Dimitrievski|Erdoan Maksut|Kalina Mrmevska|Bozidar Pejic|Tjasa Perko|Elena Stanisheva
title: Senki (Entre los muertos)
